posts.message: Trying to find out if Xamarin development on iOS or Android is common or rare in Egypt. Anyone here develop in #Xamarin?

Facebook announced its new bot platform for messenger few hours ago. I've created a hubot adapter for it, if anyone is interested.
For those who don't know what hubot is, check https://hubot.github.com/ . Github, for instance, uses hubot for everything including staging and deployments. It's cool, check it out :D

https://github.com/MohamedBassem/hubot-messenger-platform
posts.caption: github.com
posts.description: hubot-messenger-platform - A hubot adapter for the new messenger platform

posts.description:
As we struggle to find suitable members to join our team, we decided to take another step , we will give a FREE course for selected people to help find our next hero, the course is not like anything , it will build the developer inside you whatever the development stack you use and its all for FREE.

1- You should be from Tanta or Nearby
2- You shouldn't be working as a full time employee for any other company
3- Your age should be between 21-26
4- YOU SHOULD HAVE A PREVIOUS KNOWLEDGE ABOUT SOFTWARE DEVELOPMENT 

Please send your CV to jobs@appout.co

posts.message: Who can give me a practical example showing the difference between  \r and \n ;) ?

Dear Geeks, 
This is not a job post. I am looking for a recruitment advise. I have been looking for a good technical team that has experience in the open source stack and knowledge in a heterogeneous, high availability project but I still can't find them. I have budget, I want four team members in a different levels. I can't find a complete team that integrates well together and will get me the expected results. 
Did anyone face the same problem before? Shall I switch technology and start depends on the .NET stack? Shall I hire people from East Europe? I didn't start yet but I can see the risk. 
Your thoughts are highly appreciated
Does anybody know about QT state machine ?

حد طلب منى ادور على Designer  هيصمم كتيب 70 صفحة مقاس صغير واقرب لبرشور .. الشغل عبارة عن تصميم الغلاف + الصفحات الداخلية اللي عبارة عن نص ومعاه صور او خرائط .. اللي يعرف حد ياريت يمنشنه او يكلمنى على الاينبوكس وانا هوصله بالمنظمة اللى محتاجة التصميم :)
